title: World within worlds
brief_description: Through time-lapse, macro and microphotography the viewer sees examples of the natural processes which the human eye cannot perceive, such as the mysteries of cell division and the inexplicable auras revealed by Kirlian photography. From the series “NGS Educational films”.
